SevenRooms | Fullstack, Python Backend, React/Redux Frontend, iOS | NYC | Full-time | Onsite | https://www.sevenrooms.com

SevenRooms is hiring for a number of engineering positions to work on our core platform, scaling our infrastructure, developing data analysis pipelines, and growing our mobile apps.

SevenRooms is a leading hospitality technology company - we're the mission-critical OS of reservation-based hospitality businesses, powering their reservation and guest management, data and analytics, operational tools, and most importantly automated marketing as a service. We're bringing a data-focused approach to hospitality to help operators market effectively and provide more personalized service.

Interested in learning more? Send your resume to engineering@sevenrooms.com
